name: JesusFourteenForty
0:
”Alexa, open jesus fourteen forty”
”Alexa, ask jesus fourteen forty for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start jesus fourteen forty”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: jesus fourteen forty
des: Listen to the latest talks from Church On The Net's "Jesus 1440". You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
